short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to search for a topic on Google News from your right-click menu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this tiny extension you will be able to search Google News for any word you find on a page with just 2 clicks. Simply select the text on the page, right-click to open the context menu and select the extension's field to search on Google News.
